name: brikllo
description: Simple task list app with GraphQL API

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npx dotenv -e env/.env.test -- ts-mocha test/integration --config mocharc/.integration.json || npm run posttest:integration
scripts.predev: npm run dev:docker:up && npm run dev:db:setup
scripts.pretest:integration: npm run test:docker:up && npm run test:db:setup
scripts.dev:db:reset: npx dotenv -e env/.env.dev -- npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.dev:db:migrate: npx dotenv -e env/.env.dev -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.dev:db:seed: npx dotenv -e env/.env.dev -- npx prisma db seed
scripts.test:db:setup: npm run test:db:migrate && npm run test:db:seed
scripts.test:db:migrate: npx dotenv -e env/.env.test -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.test:db:seed: npx dotenv -e env/.env.test -- npx prisma db seed

author: Tawan Wattana
